entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Medicine Hat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -24.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Medicine Hat Airport 10:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -24.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -28.2°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
